command.folders_go_home: Changes directory to your home directory
command.folders_list: Lists contents of current directory with details
command.folders_list_all: Lists contents of current directory, including elements starting by .
command.folders_list_recursive: Recursively lists contents of current directory
command.folder_remove_recursive: Deletes a directory and its content
command.folders_copy: Copies a directory and its content
command.files_content_page: Displays file content, page per page (Escape/Enter to navigate, Q to exit)
command.files_content_start: Displays the first 10 lines of a file
command.files_content_end: Displays the last 10 lines of a file
command.files_content_realtime: Displays the last 10 lines of a file in real time (Ctrl+C to exit)
command.archives_zip_create: Archive a folder content in a .zip
command.archives_zip_extract: Extract a .zip content in a folder
command.archives_tar_create: Archive and compress a folder content in a .tar.gz
command.archives_tar_extract: Extract a .tar.gz content in the current folder
command.processes_resources: Displays all the processes running on the machine, and shows available resources
command.rights_permissions: Changes the permissions of a file/directory
command.rights_permissions_recursive: Recursively changes the permissions of a directory
command.rights_owner: Changes the owner of a file/directory
command.rights_owner_recursive: Recursively changes the owner of a directory
command.ssh_connect: Connects to a host via SSH
command.ssh_connect_port: Connects to a host via SSH on a specified port
command.ssh_copy: Copy a file on another machine using SSH
command.ssh_copy_recursive: Copy a full directory on another machine using SSH
command.date_now: Displays the current date and time
command.disk_space: Shows available space on the disk
command.disk_inodes: Shows available inodes on the disk
command.search_file: Search all files in a directory
command.search_folder: Search all directories in a directory
command.search_owner: Search all elements with this owner in a directory
command.search_permissions: Search all elements with these permissions in a directory
command.network_port: Check a port on a distant host
command.users_group_secondary: Assign an user to a secondary group
